name: Mussels Steamed With White Wine And Curry Leaves
keywords: curry leaves, dry white wine, mussels, shellfish, main course
recipeIngredient: 1 cup finely chopped, seeded plum tomatoes
1/4 cup fresh curry leaves (sold in some Indian markets) or cilantro leaves
1 1/2 teaspoons cumin seeds, crushed in a mortar

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large lidded saucepan. Add the onion, tomatoes and curry leaves or cilantro, and cook, stirring, over medium heat until the vegetables soften.
Stir in the cumin, and cook a few minutes longer, until the onion starts to brown. Season with salt.
Add the mussels and wine, cover and cook over medium heat until the mussels open, about 8 minutes. Serve at once.
